OrgName: Quiksilver, Inc. and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiary DC Shoes, Inc.
activities:
The information gathered is used for the following:
-Improving our websites, products, and services.
-Produce reports for advertisers, sponsors and vendors that contain anonymous, aggregate information.
-Display/Send custom, personalized content.
-Establish business relationships with other persons or entities that we believe to be trustworthy (“Choice Partners “) and whose privacy policies are generally consistent with our privacy policy.
-Combine information given online, in our stores, or through catalogs with publicly available information and information from our Choice Partners or other third parties.
contacttitle1: Executive Vice President, General Counsel & Secretary
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President, General Counsel & Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: No information on alternate privacy programs relevant to the safe harbor.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
